lines.text:
[to Alice and Joe]
In the state of New York I now pronounce you husband and wife.
Sometimes when a girl dates a soldier she isn't only thinking of herself. She knows he's alone and far away from home and no one to talk to and... What are you staring at?
Alice, would you break that date tonight?
Oh! Where will I meet you?
Under the clock at the Astor at seven.
Under the clock at the Astor at seven.
Under the clock at the Astor at seven.

[to Joe]
Joe, Joe, Joe, darling, Joe. I thought I'd lost you. I didn't know where to look.
You are the most maddening lady creature I've ever been able to come in contact with. Let me take you out of all this.
